rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment neutrally describes a potential indication ('could indicate that the virus may have acquired the ability to infect people more easily').
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment discusses potential indication of easier spread and does not contain an explicit calming cue.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation or statement of uncertainty/low risk.
The segment states cases could indicate the virus acquired ability to infect more easily, describing a possibility/indicator.
